headline: Heavy snow across Rockies and Cascades, seasonable air returns to the Gulf Coast
summary: Heavy snow is expected for the Cascades and Rockies today with rounds of rain for the coast and this pattern is forecast to continue for the next couple of days.

headline: Why 2021 is shaping up to be a pivotal year for electric vehicles
summary: Automakers are shaking up and electrifying their lineups, teasing motorists with images of upcoming gasless vehicles. A roundup of upcoming electric vehicles.

headline: Pandemic's mental health burden heaviest among young adults
summary: In a recent survey, almost two-thirds of 18- to-24-year-olds reported symptoms of anxiety or depression.

headline: COVID-19 is circulating in some animals. What does that mean for us?
350-pound crocodile undergoes major surgery to remove tourist's shoe from stomach
summary: A 10.5-foot-long crocodile weighing almost 350 pounds has undergone successful surgery two months after it ate a tourist’s shoe.

headline: What other countries can learn from Israel's COVID vaccine rollout
summary: COVID-19 cases and hospitalizations are falling among vaccinated age groups in Israel, which could be a sign that Israel's speedy vaccination campaign is working.

headline: Jasmine Harrison becomes youngest woman to row solo across the ocean
summary: Jasmine Harrison, 21, has become the youngest woman to ever row across the ocean by completing a 3,000-mile journey across the Atlantic.

headline: Joe Biden could visit Texas as soon as this week, White House press secretary says
summary: White House press secretary Jen Psaki appeared on ABC's "This Week."

headline: 'This Week' Transcript 2-21-21: Jen Psaki, Rep. Steve Scalise
summary: Jen Psaki and Rep. Steve Scalise were on "This Week" Sunday, February 21. This is a rush transcript and may be updated.

headline: Scalise says Biden presidency legitimate, but refuses to say election wasn't 'stolen'
summary: Rep. Steve Scalise, the House minority whip, appeared on ABC's "This Week."

headline: 2 dead after military jet crashes near airport in Alabama
summary: Two people are dead after a military jet crashed near an Alabama airport Friday evening, officials said.

headline: New claims surrounding Malcolm X assassination surface in letter written on former NYPD officer’s death bed
summary: New revelations on circumstances surrounding the death of Malcolm X have surfaced in a letter written by a former NYPD officer on his death bed.

headline: Independent report into deadly police encounter with Elijah McClain to be released
summary: Elijah McClain was a 23-year-old autistic musician who died following a 2019 encounter with Colorado police officers.

headline: Boil water advisory lifted in Houston as Texas recovers from winter storms
summary: The city of Houston lifted its boil water advisory as much of the state of Texas' utility services recover from back-to-back winter storms.

headline: United Airlines passengers, pedestrians recall horror of watching engine rain debris
summary: Eyewitnesses on the ground and in the air recalled their horror as parts of a plane's engine broke apart mid air.

headline: Family of 11-year-old boy who died in Texas deep freeze files $100 million suit against power companies
summary: The family of 11-year-old Cristian Pineda, who died in his Texas home after the power was cut off, has filed $100M suit against power companies

headline: Snapshots of some of the lives lost to COVID-19 in the US
summary: The coronavirus has took the lives of more than 495,000 Americans and counting.

headline: Congress aims to avoid politics with independent Jan. 6 investigation
summary: Democrats and Republicans have pointed to the example set by the 9/11 Commission as a model of bipartisan cooperation.

headline: Democrats, voting rights advocates blast new Georgia election bill
summary: Democrats and voting rights advocates are sounding the alarm over a new election bill in Georgia that would add new restrictions to voting.

headline: Major warm-up heading to hard-hit South
summary: The major winter blast that has gripped the nation for the last few weeks is finally lifting.

headline: 95-year-old Tennessee man who was Nazi guard gets deported to Germany: Feds
summary: A 95-year-old Tennessee man who was a Nazi concentration camp guard has been deported to Germany for his role in the Holocaust.

headline: Motivated by community, these Black-owned businesses have grown in the pandemic
summary: Amid a pandemic, Black-owned businesses found resilience through obstacles.

headline: California district's school board resigns over comments bashing parents during virtual meeting
summary: All members of a California school district's board of trustees have resigned after several were heard making disparaging comments about parents during a meeting.

summary: Plane debris landed outside houses in a Colorado neighborhood.

headline: Family farm brings calves into the kitchen with South hit by record cold
summary: Megan and Kenny Harris are doing what it takes to save their herd.

headline: 3 dead, 2 injured after shooting inside Louisiana gun store, officials say
summary: Three people are dead and another two injured after a shooting inside a gun store in Louisiana, authorities said.
